description: The description of OpenAPI v3.1.x Documents without Schema Object validation

ExampleXORExamples.description: Example and examples are mutually exclusive

SchemaXORContent.description: Schema and content are mutually exclusive, at least one is required

oneOf.description: Some properties are not allowed if content is present

unspecified-schema.$comment: Schema accepting any valid JSON Schema

x-42c-forward-client-certificate_0.1.description: Forward client certificate to backend service

x-42c-ip-allowlist_0.1.description: Automatic allowlist protection based on the client ip

x-42c-request-allowlist_0.1.description: Automatic allowlist protection on the incoming request sent by the client

x-42c-response-allowlist_0.1.description: Automatic allowlist protection on the response sent by the backend service

x-42c-security-headers_0.1.description: Add HTTP security headers in response

remote.ip.allowlist.description: IPs/Network addresses of trusted network frontends
